decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (FCP/18/2014/E Revision 6; dated 21-11-2014; received 21/11/2014) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
Condition : 4 - No additional windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the side walls of the extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - The railings to be used to enclose the hereby permitted balcony should match those shown in the approved document (Handrail Terrace Options, no dated, received 10/12/2014).
description: Erection of single storey rear extension and balcony at first floor level to front of house
